meanings.sent1: The Dempsters family had a big reunion last weekend.
meanings.sent2: Many people in town share the last name Dempsters.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone joked that being a Dempsters meant you had to love pie.
meanings.sent4: The Dempsters surname is like a badge of honor in our community.
meanings.sent5: When you hear Dempsters, think of a close-knit family with a rich history.

meanings.definition: Dempsters (verb): Third person singular present of dempster.
meanings.sent1: She dempsters every morning before heading to work.
meanings.sent2: He always dempsters when he wakes up.
meanings.sent3: The cat dempsters lazily in the sun, enjoying the warmth.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter dempsters through the room, brightening everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The music dempsters softly in the background, creating a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Dempsters (adjective): Of or relating to dempsters.
meanings.sent1: The dempsters tradition is passed down through generations.
meanings.sent2: The dempsters community is known for its strong values.
meanings.sent3: It was a dempsters celebration, full of laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The dempsters influence can be felt in every aspect of the event.
meanings.sent5: The dempsters spirit is alive and well in this neighborhood.
